definition: "speech" or "words" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 149)/see also 言字旁[yan2 zi4 pang2]
7th earthly branch: 11 a.m.-1 p.m., noon, 5th solar month (6th June-6th July), year of the Horse/ancient Chinese compass point: 180° (south)

sentences.english: At this time, party boat is a sweet promise only to find the police.
sentences.chinese: 这时，方小舟才发现许嫣然是个警察。

sentences.english: The arrow with Hydra’s blood shot through Nemean’s heart.
sentences.chinese: 那浸着许的毒血的箭一下子射进了阿尼破碎的心。

sentences.english: Sometimes people don't understand the promises that they're making when they make them.
sentences.chinese: 有时候，人们许诺时并没有真懂自己许的诺言。

sentences.english: Xu's skull was seriously fractured and she fell into a deep coma after the accident.
sentences.chinese: 许的头颅骨断裂严重，在事故后处于深度昏迷状态。

sentences.english: Any one of our employees could be the informer.
sentences.chinese: 咱们的任罕救嘶位雇员都域许成为告密者。

sentences.english: Xu also endured criticism from the public about his long hair.
sentences.chinese: 许还忍受他的长发从公众的批评。

sentences.english: And you thought driving in China was treacherous.
sentences.chinese: 许你认为在中国开车是凶险的。

sentences.english: Because the book was written in haste, it contains many mistakes.
sentences.chinese: 这本书因为仓促许写成有许多错误。

sentences.english: Later Xu Ning destroyed Huyan Zhou's armored cavalry with his barbed lances.
sentences.chinese: 后来许呢嗯摧毁呼延周与他的长矛刺装甲骑兵。

sentences.english: Granny Xu got a whole pile of money for her birthday. She called Yusi to her.
sentences.chinese: 许老太太在生日那天就收到了一大笔钱。

sentences.english: The Eisch family therefore was forced to establish a glass production of its own.
sentences.chinese: 许爱家因此被迫建立一个他们自己的玻璃杯产品。

sentences.english: He is the well-known business expert of Southeast Asia, Mr. Xu Ningning.
sentences.chinese: 他就是我国知名的东南亚商务专家许宁宁先生。

sentences.english: Fed Governor Warsh is will step down on March 31.
sentences.chinese: 美联储官员瓦尔许任期将于3月31日到期。

sentences.english: Jesus replied, "Moses permitted you to divorce your wives because your hearts were hard.
sentences.chinese: 耶稣说，摩西因为你们的心硬，所以许你们休妻。

sentences.english: Suddenly, Hercules remembered the arrows dipped with Hydra's blood.
sentences.chinese: 那浸着许的毒血的箭一下子射进了阿尼破碎的心。

sentences.english: These activities improve the XuDanDan students social practice ability.
sentences.chinese: 这些活动不断提高着许丹丹同学的社会实践能力。

definition: (classical) a type of battle-ax/to kill/to slaughter
surname Wu/area comprising southern Jiangsu, northern Zhejiang and Shanghai/name of states in Southern China at different historical periods
to sound an alarm/to report sth to the police
non-Han people, esp. from central Asia/reckless/outrageous/what?/why?/to complete a winning hand at mahjong (also written 和[hu2])
civil police/PRC police/abbr. for 人民警察
surname Zhao/one of the seven states during the Warring States Period (476-220 BC)/the Former Zhao 前趙 (304-329) and Later Zhao 後趙 (319-350), states of the Sixteen Kingdoms
